    • 方法详细资料

      • isMnemonicHidden

        public static boolean isMnemonicHidden()
        Gets the state of the hide mnemonic flag. This only has meaning if this feature is supported by the underlying OS.
        返回:
        true if mnemonics are hidden, otherwise, false
        从以下版本开始:
        1.4
        另请参阅:
        #setMnemonicHidden

      • isOnVista

        public static boolean isOnVista()
        Checks if is on vista.
        返回:
        true, if is on vista

      • paintText

        public static void paintText(java.awt.Graphics g,
                             javax.swing.AbstractButton b,
                             java.awt.Rectangle textRect,
                             java.lang.String text,
                             int textShiftOffset)
        Renders a text String in Windows without the mnemonic. This is here because the WindowsUI hiearchy doesn't match the Component heirarchy. All the overriden paintText methods of the ButtonUI delegates will call this static method.

        参数:
        g - Graphics context
        b - Current button to render
        textRect - Bounding rectangle to render the text.
        text - String to render
        textShiftOffset - the text shift offset

      • isLeftToRight

        public static boolean isLeftToRight(java.awt.Component c)
        是否组件的排列方向是从左到右.
        参数:
        c - the c
        返回:
        true, if is left to right
